properties.description:
This workflow monitors a SecureX mailbox for incoming email with Bitcoin Address detected by Cisco Secure Email. When an email is received, the workflow get report from Bitcoinabuse for Bitcoin Address reputation. URL will be parse from the email body and send to Cisco Malware Analytics. A suspicious judgment will be set for Observables from the email. SecureX Casebook will be create with all details.

By default variable 'Secure_Malware_Analytics' is set to 'false'. Change it to 'true' and modify the api key value to use it.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup 
Target Type : HTTP Endpoint, SMTP Endpoint

Targets: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target, Bitcoinabuse_Target

For more information : aargeris@cisco.com

properties.script:
import sys
from datetime import datetime
import time

linux_time = int(time.time()) 

t =  int(linux_time)
timeISO = (datetime.fromtimestamp(t).isoformat())+'+00:00'

delta = 86400 * 30
linux_time = int(time.time()) + delta

t =  int(linux_time)
end_time = (datetime.fromtimestamp(t).isoformat())+'.000Z'
